boardgame.description: Dead of Winter: The Long Night is a standalone expansion for Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game that introduces the Raxxon location where horrible experiments will spill out into the town unless players can contain them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game has players at a new colony location trying to survive with new survivors against brand new challenges. Can you handle being raided by members of other colonies? Will you explore more and unravel the mysteries of the Raxxon pharmaceutical location to find powerful items but release stronger enemies? Or will you upgrade your colony to help it better withstand the undead horde? These are all choices you will get to make in this new set, and if you want, you can mix in the survivors and cards from the original set to increase the variety even more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Part of the Dead of Winter series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/210973/item/4723380#4723380]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Kid free for a month... need date money!!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction. glookose only!

PLAID HAT GAMES (PLD10001) Dead of Winter: The Long Night is the new stand-alone expansion for Dead of Winter: A Crossroads game. Obtain more of everything that made Dead of Winter an epic struggle for power and survival! Experience a new colony full of new survivors and new gameplay elements, each of which is introduced to players through its own game scenario. Fight off bandits from another colony, build improvements to your colony, and most intriguingly, unravel the mysteries of the new Raxxon Pharmaceutical location. It is full of powerful items, but also full of Raxxon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s twisted human experiments that show up in the game as disturbing new enemies. Dead of Winter: The Long Night can be bought alone and is a fully-realized Dead of Winter experience by itself. You can also combine everything - characters, items, objectives, crossroad cards, etc. - between The Long Night and the original Dead of Winter.

Fight off bandits from another colony, build improvements to your colony, and most intriguingly, unravel the mysteries of the new Raxxon Pharmaceutical location. It is full of powerful items, but also full of Raxxon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s twisted human experiments that show up in the game as disturbing new enemies. Dead of Winter: The Long Night can be bought alone and is a fully-realized Dead of Winter experience by itself. You can also combine everything - characters, items, objectives, crossroad cards, etc. - between The Long Night and the original Dead of Winter.

I have the base game for sale separately.

I have replaced the 6 location tiles common with the base Crossroads game with the card stock equivalents from the base game (pictured). These are exactly the same in terms of graphics and all dimensions other than thickness/weight. Price has been discounted for this; everything else original is present and in excellent condition, having only been used a few times. The instructions are in good condition save for the bottom corner of the first few pages which appear to have been attacked by a cat (best guess), but all content is entirely legible (see picture). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship flat rate priority (medium box, ~$13.60) within a business day. PM me with any questions. Thanks!

Reserved for ScoobySnacker for pickup at Gen Con Please submit payment via PayPal, Google Wallet or Venmo to gramaw@gmail.com. Alternatively, you may pay, via one of these methods or COD, directly at the convention. Since I am selling so many games I plan to meet as many buyers as possible on Saturday morning at 9AM outside of hall A on level 1 of the convention center, near room 128 (this was the former location of multiple Gen Con Math trade meetups, in case you are familiar.) You can find a link to a map of the denoted area here: https://boardgamegeek.com/image/4236187/gramaw If at all possible please meet me at this time and location. If this will not be possible, please Geekmail me so we can make an alternative arrangement. Lastly, my phone number is 847.454.6369 if you need to reach me at the convention.

I have opened the shrink but otherwise all components are unpunched. Includes the following Promos: Rich Sommer BGG Crossroads Promo Postage costs will vary depending on your location. In the U.K. I normally use MyHermes as they can collect from my location - not all of the couriers do. The cost of shipping within the U.K. is normally between £5-£10 depending on the weight of the game - most of the regular sized (square box) games I am selling tend to be in the 2-5kg category. I always ship with tracking information and enough insurance to cover the cost of the game. Please contact me for a postage quote before purchasing the game.
